about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Creating the finest jelly candies since 2010

story.paragraph1: At Neviza, we have been operating as one of Turkey's leading jelly candy manufacturers since 2010. We combine modern technology with traditional flavors to produce high-quality and delicious products.
story.paragraph2: We adhere to international hygiene and quality standards and continuously conduct research and development activities in our production processes. Thanks to this, we can offer innovative products that appeal to both children and adults.
story.paragraph3: We export our products to more than 4 countries worldwide. Through our customer satisfaction-focused approach, we have made the Neviza brand a symbol of reliable and quality products.
